title: Windows XP PRO SP3 (5508) VistaVG Ultimate Style
description:
Win XP PRO SP3 5508 VistaVG Ultimate +SATA-Raid-Reloaded

- NO CD-KEY needed....already slipstreamed.

- NO ACTIVATION needed...

- NO CRACK needed....

- NO PATCHES needed...

PASSES ALL WGA CHECKS - FULLY UPDATEABLE !!!!!

A CLEAN INSTALL IS HIGHLY RECOMMENDED TO TAKE ADVANTADGE OF ALL FEATURES AND CONFIGURATIONS.

BURN BOOTABLE .ISO AT VERY SLOW SPEED ( USE ISO - Burner provided ) ... AND INSTALL FROM BOOT (not Desktop) !!!




====================

* DriverPack Chipset
* DriverPack MassStorage
* DriverPack LAN
* DriverPack WLAN

==========================

====================
Addons Integrated:
====================

- Vista RTM Boot screen
- VistaVG Ultimate Black Theme ( default )
- Vista Aero Cursors Black ( default )
- Vista Sounds ( default )
- Vista Sidebar
- Vista RTM Fonts
- Vista Visual ToolTip
- Vista Backgrounds
- Vista SceenSavers
- Vista User Accounts pictures
- Custom Welcome/Shut Down screen ( NEW )
- ToolBar Styler
- Clear Type Tuning
- LClock
- Image Resizer
- Microsoft Power Toys (Power calculator, SyncToy, TweakUI)
- DAMN NFO Viewer
- CCleaner 2.06.567    
- Unlocker 1.8.5
- Right Click Image Converter 2.2.0 ( pre-activated )
- IconPackager 3.2 ( pre-activated )

....YOU CAN CHANGE ICONS AND FOLDERS TO LQQK MORE LIKE VISTA WITH ICONPACKAGER AND THEMES PROVIDED !!!

- WinRAR 3.71 Registered with Vista themes
- Firefox 2.0.0.13
- Internet Explorer 7
- WMP 11.0.5721.5145
- Calculator Plus
- Java Runtime Environment 6 Update 5
- .NET Framework 1.1 + 2.0 + 3.0 + 3.5
- DirectX 9.0c End-User Runtime March 2008
- KB905474 - Windows Genuine Advantage Notificationss ( WGA )


==================
What&#039;s removed:
==================

- Games
- Internet Games
- Pinball
- Screensavers
- IBM Thinkpad
- Printers
- Scanners
- Images and Backgrounds
- Movie Maker
- Music Samples
- Old CD Player and Sound Recorder
- Windows Sounds
- MSN Explorer
- Netmeeting
- Windows Messenger
- Disc Cleanup
- Windows Tour

======================
Patches and Tweaks:
======================

- Increased TCPIP To 100 (default 10)
- Uxtheme Patch - Enable
- Set home page - Google.com
- Show Drive Letter in front of all drives - Enabled
- Internet Explorer-Set Internet Explorer to accept 10 connects at a time

- .NET Framework is installed during setup. It will take a while until it&#039;s done, but don&#039;t worry, the setup doesn&#039;t freeze.
